summary: A comprehensive test suite that verifies the behavior of a YAML loading utility, covering dumping operations, Unicode handling, environment variable interpolation, inclusion of external YAML files and directories with various merging and naming strategies (including recursive scenarios), as well as error conditions such as invalid variables, encoding problems, missing keys, and unhashable keys.
business_intent: Provide confidence that the YAML loader works correctly in production environments, preventing configuration errors and ensuring robust handling of complex configuration compositions.
